**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T03:51:47Z" title="03/15/2015 03:51  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by quasarrgames**

Moved to Kerbal Network, since this is about the forum rather than the game. 

Anyway, on the menu line just above the first post on a page, you should see a drop-down menu that is labeled, "rate this thread." You can give it 1 to 5 stars.

What defines whether or not we can rate a thread?

Happy landings!
All threads can be rated. Give it a try ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> All threads can be rated. Give it a try ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I have tried it. But many threads I read do not have the 'Rate This Thread' tab visible.

I was wondering what criteria defines whether or that tab/menu is available.

Happy landings!

Threads can or can't be rated depending on the subforum in which they appear. This was done because it was thought that the system might be abused, though that was before my time, and do not know the specific reasoning for different subforums.

Thanks Vanamonde!

I was finally starting to figure it out.

Happy landings!
